class.name: PhysicsShapeQueryParameters3D
class.brief_description: Parameters to be sent to a 3D shape physics query.
class.description: This class contains the shape and other parameters for 3D intersection/collision queries. See also [PhysicsShapeQueryResult3D].

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the query will take [Area3D]s into account.
If [code]true[/code], the query will take [PhysicsBody3D]s into account.

The physics layer(s) the query will take into account (as a bitmask). See [url=https://docs.godotengine.org/en/latest/tutorials/physics/physics_introduction.html#collision-layers-and-masks]Collision layers and masks[/url] in the documentation for more information.
The list of objects or object [RID]s that will be excluded from collisions.
The collision margin for the shape.

The [Shape3D] that will be used for collision/intersection queries. This stores the actual reference which avoids the shape to be released while being used for queries, so always prefer using this over [member shape_rid].
